listeningQuestion.question: What did the detectives find in the parcel?
listeningQuestion.translation: 侦探们在包裹里发现了什么？

content.editorNotes: 本课讲述了一个侦探办案的故事，重点学习过去进行时的用法，以及短语动词中小品词的使用。故事展现了一个出人意料的结局。

dialogueText.heading: 课文
dialogue: The plane was late and detectives were waiting at the airport all morning.
They were expecting a valuable parcel of diamonds from South Africa.
A few hours earlier, someone had told the police that thieves would try to steal the diamonds.
When the plane arrived, some of the detectives were waiting inside the main building while others were waiting on the airfield.
Two men took the parcel off the plane and carried it into the Customs House.
While two detectives were keeping guard at the door, two others opened the parcel.
To their surprise, the precious parcel was full of stones and sand!

translation.heading: 翻译
notes: 飞机误点了，侦探们在机场等了整整一上午。
他们正期待从南非来的一个装着钻石的贵重包裹。
数小时以前，有人向警方报告，说有人企图偷走这些钻石。
当飞机到达时，一些侦探等候在主楼内，另一些侦探则守候在停机坪上。
有两个人把包裹拿下飞机，进了海关。
这时两个侦探把住门口，另外两个侦探打开了包裹。
令他们吃惊的是，那珍贵的包裹里面装的全是石头和沙子！

newwords.heading: New words and expressions 生词和短语

examples: expect sb. to do sth. - 期待某人做某事
I expect so. - 我想是这样的

notes.toggle: adj. 珍贵的（带感情色彩）

notes.title: 过去进行时的用法
content: 表示过去某一时刻正在进行的动作
常与when, while, as等连词连用
与一般过去时配合使用时，进行时表示持续时间较长的动作

notes.title: 短语动词中的小品词
content: 小品词可以是介词也可以是副词
有宾语的是介词，没有宾语的是副词
介词位置相对固定，而副词位置可以变动
例如：take off = take the coat off = take it off

notes.title: some和others的搭配
content: some of the + 复数名词 + while/and others...
用于区分不同群体的不同行为

notes.title: 时间表达
content: a few hours earlier = a few hours before
表示整段时间用all + 时间单位

notes.context: 表示警戒或保护某物/某人
notes.example: They kept a close guard over the thieves.
To my surprise, the teacher was late.
The cup is full of water.
Two men took the parcel off the plane.

multipleChoice.question: When did someone tell the police about the thieves?
options: As soon as the plane arrived
multipleChoice.explanation: 文中提到'A few hours earlier'，说明是在飞机到达之前

multipleChoice.question: The parcel was valuable because it was supposed to contain ___.
multipleChoice.explanation: 文中提到包裹里应该装的是钻石

multipleChoice.question: What were the detectives doing while the parcel was being opened?
multipleChoice.explanation: 文中提到'two detectives were keeping guard at the door'

fillInBlanks.sentence: The detectives were _____ at the airport all morning.
To their _____, the parcel was full of stones and sand.
fillInBlanks.hint: 表示意外或惊讶的心情

notes.title: 钻石走私背景
notes.content: 南非是世界著名的钻石产地，钻石走私一直是一个严重的问题。警方和海关需要采取严密的防范措施来打击钻石走私活动。

notes.title: 机场安保
notes.content: 本课反映了机场安保的重要性。在现代机场，已经采用了更先进的安检设备和程序，但人工查验仍然是必不可少的环节。
